description:
This bright rear light lets you add a lot of visibility without adding a lot of weight. With easy USB charging and 5 different modes the Plus rear light is a worthwhile addition to your kit. Knog has developed a clever magnetic mount that lets you swap your Plus light from your bike to you, or just off your bike with a click. There is also an integrated clip makes it easy to attach this lightweight light to you clothing or your 4-legged friend on low-light outings. Weighing in at a paltry 12 grams a piece this little light won’t slow you down or tug at your kit.

  • Magnetic mount lets you attach your light to the bike mount base with little more than a magnetic click. Mount base includes multiple different sized o-rings for mounting to bars, posts, stays or even your helmet vents
  • Integrated clip lets you attach the light to you, your pack, your pooch, really anything you want easily seen
  • 5 different modes: steady, strobe, pulse, fancy flash and eco flash
  • Waterproof design means that if you are willing to ride in it, the Plus will keep shining
  • Simple 1-button interface lets you cycle through modes with a short press or lock the light (so it won’t turn on in your bag) with a long press
  • Integrated USB plug (type-A) means you don’t need to tote around a cable to charge your light
  • Easy USB charging means there are no longer any reasons to have dim light
  • In the box: Plus Rear light, 2x interchangeable straps for bars/seat posts 22-27mm / 28-32mm+ and a magnetic mount base
name: Knog Plus Rear Light
